title: club
body: Hello in my club my friend can see I'm the leader but on my account it says I'm not in the club which I never left it  if someone knows how to fix this or a person from riot can fix this that would be awesome the club name is               Big game hunters

replies.body: Actually the same thing happened to me.  I submitted a ticket quite a while ago and have gotten no replies.

Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can help out individually with this.  There shouldn't be any issues with clubs currently, so we want to check it out.  We'll reply back asap!
